text: E hai labelaa beenei: i mua hua tangada ma gaa dudu nia kiliidi o dana tigidaumaha, gei di hege o tangada hai mee dabu ga hanimoi ga helekai gi tangada dela belee hai dana tigidaumaha, “Gaamai hunu goneiga mada, e gai go tangada hai mee dabu, gei au gaa daa gii mmoo. Mee hagalee gai nia mee ala e dunu i lodo di baalanga, gaamai hua mada.”
